head.title: June 25-July 1; Spying as a Business Tool

hedline.hl1: June 25-July 1; Spying as a Business Tool

block.p: One of the Microsoft Corporation's most bitter rivals, the database software maker Oracle Corporation, said it had authorized spying on three Microsoft-financed lobbying groups. Its effort was revealed earlier this month after private investigators were caught offering cash to janitors for the trash of the Association for Competitive Technology, a group that has been lobbying for Microsoft in its federal antitrust suit.
